title: Chair, "Honey-Pop", 2001
provenance: 2008: acquired directly from the designer, Tokujin Yoshioka
creditline: Mueum purchase from Friends of Product Design and Decorative Arts Fund through gift of Lisa Roberts and David Seltzer
description: Roughly cylindrical form of thin paper layers fanned out to form chair; the front and top cut and shaped to form contoured seat, low arms, and back, the seat further compressed and contoured by designer sitting in chair.

tombstone.epitaph: Chair, "Honey-Pop", 2001.Paper. Mueum purchase from Friends of Product Design and Decorative Arts Fund through gift of Lisa Roberts and David Seltzer. 2008-6-1.
